Email_address_in_login.description: No=(Default) Do Not; or Yes=e-mail address is mandatory in create-user and shown it in login/sign-in page

Generate_memory_leak.description: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other positive number is the amount of memory leak in MegaBytes

Repeat_ShipEx_call.description: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other positive number is the number of repeat calls to ShipEx

Sum_to_add_to_cart_calculation.description: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other number is the sum to add to cart calculation

Add_wrong_product_to_speakers_category.description: No=(Default) Disabled; Yes = Move product-id = 13 from Headphones category to Speakers category

Spelling_mistakes_in_order_payment_page.description: No=(Default) Do not make; Yes=make spelling mistakes in order payment page

Max_concurrent_sessions.description: (-1)=(Default) Disabled; any other number is the number of concurrentSessions

Mix_pictures_in_home_page.description: No=(Default) Do not; Yes=Mix places of pictures in home page

Slow_DB_call.description: 0=(Default) Disabled, any other positive number is the number of seconds to delay the Stored Procedure execution

Slow_Page.description: No=(Default) Do not; Yes=show more than 40 seconds difference between WiFi and 3G in optimization report

SLA_Add_Delay_In_Add_To_Cart_Response_Ti.description: 0=(Default) Disabled; any other positive number = the number of seconds to add as a delay in response time

SLA_Number_Of_Sessions_To_Add_The_Delay.description: This parameter is enabled only if 'SLA_Add_Delay_In_Add_To_Cart_Response_Time' is greater than zero. The system will start adding the delay if the number of sessions will be higher than this value and will stop the delay when the number of sessions will go back down. Valid values: 0-n, default=20

Different_price_in_UI_and_API.description: No=(Default) Do not; Yes=Front End takes the product price and doubles it (multiply the product price by 2) to show a difference in product price in API (DB, Web Back End) and UI (Front End)
